name: All-Devouring Narwhal
storytext:
In the most fantastical of fables, or perhaps in the most rabid of ravings, the true stars in the depths of cosmos are just as full of life as on Teyvat, while the universe itself is akin to an ocean.
Perhaps the universe's infiltration of Teyvat has never ceased, and perhaps the drawing of borders around this world was the work of a higher will, meant to protect it.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the All-Devouring Narwhal

skills.name: Starfall Shower
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE_2] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. This character deals +1 DMG for every 3 additional max HP provided by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S22044]</color> (Max +3.) After this, $[K56] 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. This character deals +1 DMG for every 3 additional max HP provided by <color=#FFFFFFFF>Insatiable Appetite</color> (Max +3.) After this, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost.
skills.description: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. This character deals +1 DMG for every 3 additional max HP provided by Insatiable Appetite (Max +3.) After this, Discard 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost.

skills.name: Ravaging Devourer
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122043]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Dark Shadow</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Hydro DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 Dark Shadow.

skills.name: Insatiable Appetite
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Deep Devourer's Domain</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 Deep Devourer's Domain.
